snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.body: Drop in a beautifully designed FAQ that surfaces the right answer at the moment of doubt. Customers get unblocked instantly, objections dissolve before they turn into tickets, and you close more sales without adding more support. Customize once, embed anywhere, and let it work 24/7.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.headline: Watch questions answer themselves in real-time
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.body: Choose structure per breakpoint—accordion, list, or cards. Control spacing, density, and alignment so it feels native.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.title: Layouts
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.body: Radius, borders, shadows, and surfaces that match your UI language. Make it look like it shipped with your product.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.title: Appearance
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.body: Role-based type styles that keep hierarchy clean. Headings, body, labels—tuned to your brand.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.title: Typography
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.subhead: Match your site and brand without compromise.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.title: Design control, down to the pixel
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.headline: Connect with every customer, everywhere
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.subheadline: AI-powered FAQ that speaks their language and understands their needs.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.0.body: Ship in new languages without a translation project. Keep the experience consistent everywhere.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.0.title: Instant localization
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.1.body: Support right-to-left languages without redesigning layouts. Directionality stays correct.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.1.title: RTL ready
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.2.body: Adapt tone and phrasing for the audience, not just the words. The content reads natural.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.2.title: Locale-aware copy
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.3.body: Structured content that can be indexed when you need it. Make answers discoverable.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.3.title: SEO foundations
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.4.body: Strict contracts prevent drift. Changes are explicit, auditable, and repeatable.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.4.title: Governance
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.5.body: Fast renders and sensible loading so the page stays smooth across devices and networks.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.5.title: Performance
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.title: Global by default
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.headline: FAQ widget. Beautiful answers. Built to be fast.
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.subheadline: Polished design, effortless updates, and SEO foundations—ready for any language, powered by AI.
snapshot.blocks.locale-showcase.copy.subtitle: Switch locales to see how your FAQ reads across markets—without rebuilding anything.
snapshot.blocks.locale-showcase.copy.title: Preview it in real languages
snapshot.blocks.minibob.copy.heading: Make it yours
snapshot.blocks.minibob.copy.subhead: Design your perfect FAQ right here. See changes instantly.

snapshot.blocks.overview-subpages.copy.items.0.bo: Launch fast with polished starting points you can adapt to your brand.
snapshot.blocks.overview-subpages.copy.items.1.bo: See what great FAQs look like in the wild—and borrow the patterns that convert.
snapshot.blocks.overview-subpages.copy.items.2.bo: Understand what you can control, from layouts and styling to localization and SEO.
snapshot.blocks.overview-subpages.copy.subhead: Start with templates, learn from examples, then dive into features when you’re ready.
snapshot.blocks.overview-subpages.copy.title: Explore what’s possible
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.description: Build a fast, beautiful FAQ widget. Customize, publish, and localize in minutes.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.title: FAQ widget - Clickeen
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.0.body: Lightweight embeds and lazy loading. No layout jank.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.0.title: Fast
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.1.body: Deterministic contracts and build gates keep shipping safe at scale.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.1.title: Reliable
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.2.body: Clear hierarchy, readable type, and interaction patterns that work across input methods.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.2.title: Accessible
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.title: Built like a platform
snapshot.blocks.split-left-2.copy.headline: SEO/GEO embed (indexable)
snapshot.blocks.split-left-2.copy.subheadline: This embed runs in shadow mode to inject JSON-LD (FAQPage) into the host page for indexing.
snapshot.blocks.split-left.copy.headline: Split creative (left)
snapshot.blocks.split-left.copy.subheadline: This is the left-visual variant, using the same curated instance as the hero.
snapshot.blocks.split-right-2.copy.headline: Split creative (right)
snapshot.blocks.split-right-2.copy.subheadline: This is the right-visual variant, using the same curated instance as the hero.

snapshot.blocks.split-right.copy.subheadline: This is the right-visual variant, using the same curated instance as the hero.

snapshot.blocks.split-stacked.copy.subheadline: This is the stacked variant, using the same curated instance as the hero.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.0.body: Every question left unanswered is a customer walking away. Visitors leave when they can't find what they need. A well-designed FAQ kills objections before they even form—so customers convince themselves to buy without ever reaching out.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.0.title: Stop losing sales to unanswered questions
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.1.body: Cut support volume by 40%+ when customers find answers instantly. No more slack pings. No more "quick question" emails. No more context-switching hell. Your FAQ does the heavy lifting while you focus on work that actually matters.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.1.title: Get your time back
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.2.body: The right FAQ anticipates doubt and removes friction at 2 AM when you're offline. Your answers work around the clock. Customers don't wait for you—they get unblocked, trust what they see, and hit "buy" without interrupting your day.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.2.title: Close more deals while you sleep
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.subhead: Your customers have questions. Answer them once, not a hundred times.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.title: FAQs that actually work (so you don't have to)
